item.title: reproducible abstract
item.description: A student asked me about how to include summary results in the abstract or executive summary at the top of an R Markdown report when they don’t get calculated until somewhere below. I feel like I’ve seen a generally accepted solution to this, but I can’t find it. I thought maybe Keith Baggerly mentioned this in his slides about good reproducible reports, but he doesn’t seem to. I did find this RStudio Community discussion that is relevant, but it doesn’t have quite the solution I would want.
